short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension allows you to use and synchronize font you create with Prototypo directly on your web site

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension allows you to use and synchronize font you create with Prototypo directly on your web site.

Try it now in four simple steps:
1. Download the extension and install it.
2. Connect with your Prototypo account.
3. Activate the extension by clicking on the icon in your tool bar.
4. Apply your Prototypo fonts to the web page via the CSS selectors or by using the extension selection tool.
